features: ✅ [55.3" Long Handle Broom and Dustpan Set] Made of high-quality stainless steel poles with excellent performance in rust resistant, solid and light weight, which is easy to clean. Different people’s cleaning needs will be satisfied with the five extension poles which can be installed in different length. For example the children, adult and old man, especially for backache people, help you finish the sweeping jobs without bending.

✅[Excellent Features] Large dustpan space, with heighten baffles on both sides, is designed for hold more rubbish, avoiding the rubbish falling out; Thoughtful broom teeth help you clean the hair of women or pet more quickly and conveniently, and does not get on your hands; Upgraded four layers bristles are made of PET material, more durable and stiff to clean heavier garbage

✅[Easy Assembly] You just need screw the extension poles into the hole and quickly complete the installation. And the dustpan can be stored upright and easily put into a narrow space to make the room tidier and save space, if you want to hang it for storage, this broom can also meet your requirements. Our broom dustpan set is to bring great convenience to your life.

✅[Wide Application] Ideal for home and office cleaning work, suitable for paper, dust, dirt, hair and pet hair sweeping. We also included a set of mini broom and dustpan set to help you clean the desktop rubbish, the cute dustpan is a great choice for children to clean up their DIY garage, it can be hung storage as well.

✅[After-sale Service & Package]: Applied to environmentally friendly packaging, the box contains a broom and dustpan, a extra set of mini broom dustpan set. If you have any questions about our products and services, please feel free to contact us. We would be glad to help you solve any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom is small although it works great. Good for the price and no bending with the long handled dust pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Product, but Handle Loosens
reviews.reviewText: I like the color and design, how ever it loosens as you use it. It can be annoying. Maybe, I can glue it together but it can be an annoyance while using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described!
reviews.reviewText: The broom and dustpan handles are interchangeable and can be made shorter if needed. Very sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great quality
reviews.reviewText: I'm not very impressed with it. Very lightweight. The pole unscrews itself while you are sweeping (so I'm going to tape the handle). It really doesn't work that great either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While the fact that the parts screwed together was odd to me, this has been a sturdy and very useful tool to have around. Highly recommend you get one or two…. Heading to by another one after I leave this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality broom
reviews.reviewText: I’m so disappointed in the quality of the broom. It doesn’t sweep even the smallest dirt or debri. The handle doesn’t stay screwed in. Very poor quality and I should have returned as soon as I opened it. Don’t waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the sturdiness.
reviews.reviewText: I like that it can reach further than the broom I was using before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but not quality
reviews.reviewText: The dustpan has good features like the teeth to clean the debris out of the broom. The only downfall of the dustpan is sweeping in it doesn’t go flat enough to get it all, takes many tries to achieve the proper result. The broom is short and flimsy. I should have bought the American made product with a metal dustpan and same features at my local hardware store which was the same price!!
